name: Get ONLY Params from URL no anchor
description: Regex (\?[^#]*)For a NON malformed URL will grab just the parameters portion of a URL not including the #anchor parte.g. http://www.somewhereovertherain.bow?me=1&you=true&gogogo=stop#commentsorhttp://www.somewhereovertherain.bow?me=1&you=true&gogogo=stop#orhttp://www.somewhereovertherain.bow?me=1&you=true&gogogo=stopWill all return ?me=1&you=true&gogogo=stop in group 1
author: Ian Dearn
